title: With Everyone!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>And so, Ai took this picture with Ayumu and Settsu~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Fufu.... The three of you looked like you had fun.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>We thought about what pose to make for a while before we took this picture.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>And that’s how you ended up with this masked hero pose?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Oh, do you also want to do it, Kasumi-san!? I’ll think of a pose for everyone else too, so let’s all do it together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh, that’s a bit....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I’m kind of interested. It might be a good lesson for my acting.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I’ve never taken a picture like this before either.... I’d like to try it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eeeh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I want to do it too. We haven’t taken any pictures together recently, after all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Yeah, we’ve been so busy with tests lately. It’s been a while since we’ve all been together in the clubroom, right.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>That’s right~. We were drenched in tears while studying hard, after all. Glad everything ended nicely, right, Karin-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Don’t look at me while you say that, Kanata....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Fufu, I’m glad everyone managed to avoid getting red marks.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Then, since the weather is nice, why don’t we take a picture in the courtyard after this? The test period is over, so it’s okay to have a little bit of fun, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai agrees!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>That sounds great! Would it be a picture to commemorate the end of the test period then?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s so warm today, Kanata will get sleepy if we do it outside~. Wake me up, okay, Emma-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Is that person going to be late for the club? Shall we go find them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I’ll go look for that person then! After all, we can’t start without them, right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
